title: sharaNam unnaDiyE
sahitya:
sharaNam unnaDiyE sharaNamenr-unniDam sErum enniDam pEraruL kUrum murugA


anupallavi

  karuNai koND-anbarai kaDait-tETri viDavE maruda malaimEl vITra varada pratApanE


caraNam    veLLam enap-perugum vEdanaikkuLAnOr uLLam uDaindu tam uDalum melindiDa 
taLLADi meLLa untALinai sEra vandu dayai sheyak-kOrinadum abhayam aLikkum ayyE
